The NBA has banned Toronto Raptors player Jontay Porter for life after an internal investigation found that he placed bets on basketball and gave information to a bettor to improve their odds.

articles.title: Former NFL GM Mark Dominik Has a "Dark Horse" Pick for the Titans at No. 7 - Tennessee Titans
articles.description: Dominik, who worked in a NFL front office role for 20 seasons, 19 of them with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, could see a scenario where the Titans pick Georgia tight end Brock Bowers.
articles.content:
NASHVILLE A week away from the NFL Draft, most draft analysts have the Titans taking a tackle or a receiver with the 7th overall pick.
